page.title: 10CANAL TRAFFIC
page.content: With the completion of the Cheshire Ring, traffic has increased to up to 100 boats weekly in Summer. Weekly hire of a typical 4-berth boat is upwards of Â£250 including fuel. We talked to two American families from Kentucky having a new kind of holiday . They were surprised at the work involved, finding the holiday fun but "all rain and locks! " A Warrington family found a canal holiday ideal for children who liked to get dirty and "Mess about". Shopping was generally done in small towns along the canal. With a fourth family, the canal was their home. They liked the freedom and being able to "Move the house". The Buxton Road Marina has diesel fuel and toilet emptying facilities. They also do repair and maintenance, have 76 water moorings, 20 dry berths and house canoes of a Scout group.
